## SendableMosaic.liquidateUpTo() method

Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate: number): Promise<SentMosaicTransaction<S, MosaicReceipt<R, LiquidationDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate | number | Stop after liquidating this many Troves. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentMosaicTransaction](./lib-base.sentmosaictransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MosaicReceipt](./lib-base.mosaicreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [LiquidationDetails](./lib-base.liquidationdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;
